section.section: In this section the following terms have the meanings indicated.
"Home appliance" means any device the retail cost of which exceeds $100 and which is generally used in a private residence;
"Home appliance" includes an air conditioner, washing machine, dishwasher, television set, stereo set, oil burner, and any similar item.
"Repair company" means any person who repairs home appliances for a fee or consideration.

text.section:
This section does not apply if:
The repair work is done under a service contract; or
A flat price or firm estimate is given before repair of the home appliance.
